attributes.action: Ban corporal punishment. Make it a crimnal offence to beat your children.
attributes.additional_details: Even animals are banned from being beaten. Animals cannot be beaten yet children can. Corporal punishment is degrading and causes psychological damage.
attributes.background: In this modern society is should be illegal to beat your children. However the law allows parents to beat their children as long as it does not cause serious damage. I believe that any violent action towards children should be taken as child abuse. Adults and animals cannot be beaten.
